contentrichtext.text: The '''Queens Community Board 3''' <ref>[http://www.cb3qn.nyc.gov/ Queens Community Board 3]</ref> is a local government in [[New York City]], encompassing the [[List of Queens neighborhoods|neighborhoods]] of [[Jackson Heights, Queens|Jackson Heights]], [[East Elmhurst, Queens|East Elmhurst]] and [[North Corona, Queens|North Corona]] (as well as [[LaGuardia Airport]], in the [[borough (New York City)|borough]] of [[Queens]].<ref>[http://www.nyc.gov/html/cau/html/cb/cb_queens.shtml Queens Community Boards], [[New York City]]. Accessed September 3, 2007.</ref> It is delimited by the [[Brooklyn-Queens Expressway]] to the west, the [[Grand Central Parkway]] to the north, [[Flushing Meadows Corona Park]] on the east, and [[Roosevelt Avenue (Queens)|Roosevelt Avenue]] on the south. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.nyc.gov/html/dcp/pdf/lucds/qn3profile.pdf Profile of the Community Board] {{NYCBoards}} {{Queens}} {{NYC-stub}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Queens Community Board 03}} [[Category:Queens Community Boards]]
